custom.preconds: Operation system: any Resolution: any Browser: Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Opera, Safari Authorization: non-authorized
custom.steps: 1. Take a look at the header 2. Click on the link "Log in" 3. Pass the "C15" test case (email field) 4. Pass the "C16" test case (password field) 5. Click on [Sign in] button
custom.expected: User can sign in following rules If user break rules, error message will be shown and user will not be able to sign in

custom.preconds: Operation system: any Resolution: any Browser: Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Opera, Safari Authorization: non-authorized
custom.steps: 1. Fill "Email" field following rules: - the format of the email must be [name]@[domain].[top-domain] - field can't be empty - field must not be register sensitive
custom.expected: User can fill field following rules If user break rules, error message will be shown Email should be presented in DB

custom.preconds: Operation system: any Resolution: any Browser: Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Opera, Safari Authorization: non-authorized
custom.steps: 1. Pass the "C15" test case (email field) 2. Fill the field following rules: - field must not be empty - user can paste the password - password must be correct with registered
custom.expected: User can fill the field following rules If user break rules, error message will be shown Password should be automatically masked (******)

custom.preconds: Operation system: any Resolution: any Browser: Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Opera, Safari Authorization: non-authorized
custom.steps: 1. Take a look at the header 2. Click on "Sign up" link 3. Pass "C12" test case (username) 4. Pass "C13" test case (email) 5. Pass "c14" test case (password) 6. Fill in "Repeat Password" field 7. Click on the button [Sign up]
custom.expected: 1. User can register following rules 2. User can't register not following rules

custom.preconds: Operation system: any Resolution: any Browser: Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Opera, Safari Authorization: non-authorized
custom.steps: 1. Take a look at the header 2. Click on "Sign up" link 3. Fill in field "Username" following rules: - min 4 letters - max 36 letters - only Latin characters - using spec symbols “ - _ “ - no using Register sensitive - name must be unique
custom.expected: User can input field following rules If user break rule, error message will be shown

custom.preconds: Operation system: any Resolution: any Browser: Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Opera, Safari Authorization: non-authorized
custom.steps: 1. Pass the "C12" test case (Username) 2. Fill in field "Email" following rules: - the format of the email must be [name]@[domain].[top-domain] - email must be unique
custom.expected: User can fill field following rules If user break rules, error message will be shown

custom.preconds: Operation system: any Resolution: any Browser: Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Opera, Safari Authorization: non-authorized
custom.steps: 1. Pass the "C12" and "C13" test cases (username and email) 2. Fill in field password following rules: - it must include min 4 and max 30 letters - there must be at least one symbol, one integer, capital letter
custom.expected: User can fill field following rules If user break rule, error message will be shown

custom.preconds: Operation system: any Resolution: any Browser: Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Opera, Safari Authorization: authorized
custom.steps: 1. Take a look at the footer 2. Click on "New post" link 3. Pass the "C17" test case 4. Pass the "C18" test case 5. Pass the "C19" test case 6. Pass the "C20" test case 7. Click on the [Publish article] button
custom.expected: Article will be shown in user's profile and global feed

case.title: User can publish article inputting letters, numbers, special characters, spaces (if it not the first or few in a row) in Article title field

custom.preconds: Operation system: any Resolution: any Browser: Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Opera, Safari Authorization: authorized
custom.steps: Fill the "Article title field"
custom.expected: Article will be published

case.title: Error "Article title can't consider more than 240 symbols"

custom.preconds: Operation system: any Resolution: any Browser: Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Opera, Safari Authorization: authorized
custom.expected: If user typed more than 240 symbols in the article field. error message "Article title can't consider more than 240 symbols" will appear

case.title: Error "Article title can consider spaces only if it not first and few in a row"

custom.preconds: Operation system: any Resolution: any Browser: Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Opera, Safari Authorization: authorized
custom.expected: If user typed spaces at the beginning or few in a row, error message "Article title can consider spaces only if it not first and few in a row" will appear

case.title: Error "Title of article can’t be empty (minimum 5 symbols)"

custom.preconds: Operation system: any Resolution: any Browser: Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Opera, Safari Authorization: authorized
custom.expected: If user left field empty or typed less than 5 sympols, error message "Title of article can’t be empty (minimum 5 symbols)" will appear
